mapper.select: SELECT T1.order_id, T1.user_id, T5.login_id, T1.store_id, T2.store_name, T1.total_price, T2.store_picture_url, T3.menu_id, T4.menu_name, T4.price, T1.order_address, T1.created_date, T1.modified_date, T1.STATUS FROM orders T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN store T2 ON T1.store_id = T2.store_id LEFT OUTER JOIN order_menu T3 ON T1.order_id = T3.order_id LEFT OUTER JOIN menu T4 ON T3.menu_id = T4.menu_id LEFT OUTER JOIN users T5 ON T1.user_id = T5.user_id WHERE T5.login_id = #{login_id}
